results.title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to submit to Congress a report on the utilization of small businesses with respect to certain Federal contracts.

results.latest_major_action: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 198.

actions.description: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 198.
Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Reported by Senator Risch with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.
Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.
